lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: Hey Yuka, [type:phrase, eng:what are you doing, jpn:何しているの]?

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: [type:phrase, eng:None of your business, jpn:大きなお世話].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: Come on, just [type:verb, eng:tell, jpn:教えて] me!

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: [type:phrase, eng:Get out, jpn:出て] of my room. [pause:0.3][speed:slow][type:adverb, eng:Now, jpn:今].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: How [type:adjective, eng:rude, jpn:失礼]...

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: [type:phrase, eng:Get out, jpn:出て]!

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: [speed:fast][b]Wait![/b][pause:0.3] [speed:normal]I know your [type:noun, eng:secret, jpn:秘密]

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: I was at [type:noun, eng:school, jpn:学校]. I went early, didn't even have [type:noun, eng:breakfast, jpn:朝ごはん].

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: I was at the [type:noun, eng:mall, jpn:ショッピングモール] with my friends.

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: I was in the [type:noun, eng:kitchen, jpn:台所].

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: I had a [type:noun, eng:student council, jpn:] [type:noun, eng:meeting, jpn:]. It was so [type:adjective, eng:boring, jpn:] I almost [type:phrase, eng:fell asleep, jpn:].

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: [speed:slow]I was… I was at a [type:noun, eng:race, jpn:レース], okay!?

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: It was me, [b]Speedy Sally[/b], and [b]Racer Randy[/b].

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: I thought I would [type:verb, eng:win, jpn:勝つ]. I'm way [type:adjective, eng:faster, jpn:より速い] than those two.

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: But I got a [type:noun, eng:flat tire, jpn:パンク] right before the finish line and [type:verb, eng:lost, jpn:負けた]!

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: [b][type:phrase, eng:Don't, jpn:ダメ][/b] you dare [type:verb, eng:tell, jpn:言う] [type:noun, eng:mom, jpn:お母さん] and [type:noun, eng:dad, jpn:お父さん]!

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I didn’t eat your [type:noun, eng:cake, jpn:ケーキ].

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: I was hungry okay!

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: A leather jacket?

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: It's not really Yuka's style...

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: I didn't know Yuka liked cars so much...

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: A box of tools?

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: Seems like a strange thing to keep under the bed...
